channel.title: Special bar problem

item.title: Special bar problem
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

I am using richscape base, and i have a checkSpecialBar method that check if the weapon should have a special bar.

It looks something like this.

	public void checkSpecialBar() {

		switch (playerEquipment[3]) {

			case 861:
			case 1377:
			case 1434:
			case 2745:
			case 2746:
			case 2747:
			case 2748:
			case 3204:
			case 4151:
			case 4153:
			case 4587:
			case 5698:
			case 7158:
			case 7603:
			case 14484:
				specialBar();
			break;
		}
	}

When I equip one of those weapons I get the special bar interface but when i unequip the weapon it dose not go away, and when you use the special with a weapon that’s not suppose to have one it crashes the client.

So i was thinking about making a “Default:” but I do not know the normal weapon interface.

	public void checkSpecialBar() {

		switch (playerEquipment[3]) {

			case 861:
			case 1377:
			case 1434:
			case 2745:
			case 2746:
			case 2747:
			case 2748:
			case 3204:
			case 4151:
			case 4153:
			case 4587:
			case 5698:
			case 7158:
			case 7603:
			case 14484:
				specialBar();
			break;
                        
                        default:
                          outStream.createFrame(??);
                        break;
		}
	}

Is there a better way to do this, or what is the interface for a normal weapon.

Read full topic
